byline.contributor: Ranya Kadri and Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting.

abstract: Ayoub Bourini, Imam at mosque in eastern part of Amman, Jordan, says Mohammod Abdulazeez seemed to lack religious zeal and often spent time alone during family visit; Abdulazeez traveled to country before embarking on deadly shooting in Chattanooga, Tenn, fueling speculation that he was radicalized there; multiple accounts from Jordan seem to confirm that he acted on his own.
lead_paragraph: People in the neighborhood where Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez lived for some months said they had seen no sign of the rage he unleashed in Tennessee.

headline.main: Chattanooga Gunman a Solitary Visitor in Jordan
headline.print_headline: Chattanooga Gunman a Solitary Visitor in Jordan, Former Neighbors Say

snippet: People in the neighborhood where Mohammod Youssuf Abdulazeez lived for some months said they had seen no sign of the rage he unleashed in Tennessee.
